blogs.name: my sweet mauritius
blogs.description: Française installée depuis 9 ans à l'île Maurice, ... Chaque semaine ou presque, je publie mon coup de coeur avec ma signature : Ayo J'Adore !

blogs.name: The Eagle's Lodge
blogs.description: The Eagle's Lodge is the online home of a Mauritian blogger / political observer / net activist who blogs about both the positives and negatives of the country.

blogs.name: yashvinblogs.com
blogs.description: I use it a lot for sharing bits and pieces of my personal life, hence a personal blog. That’s why you will might regularly get bored when you come across posts where I talk about me, me and just me. Kidding. You will love being here all the time

blogs.name: LEVER LEPEP! KNOW THY TRUTH!
blogs.description: Shocking truth, Student help, stuffs around the island,...

blogs.name: Mademoiselle Nomad
blogs.description: I am Beatrice Chan, an author and a perpetual nomad. I help people who live abroad navigate the intricacies of their new lives, by guiding them through the various stages. By integrating authenticity, meaning, and creativity in the way we do life abroad, we are able to sail through with greater ease, joy and flow.

blogs.name: MOTIZIL
blogs.description: Franco-mauricienne, j’ai crée le blog motizil.com pour partager mes connaissances de l’Ile Maurice et vous aider à préparer votre voyage. Bien plus que des plages, je souhaite mettre en avant toutes les richesses de l’Ile Maurice et vous montrer qu’il y a bien plus à faire que de lézarder sur les plages.

blogs.name: mystopovers
blogs.description: If you ever come across a tall, long-bearded fellow walking the paths of life, convinced that there’s always something beautiful somewhere to discover, admire, enjoy – on earth, in the sky, over the waters – anywhere in the real world where it just happens to […]
